seo.title: CeSIUM - Software Engineering Student Center at UMinho
seo.description: CeSIUM is the Software Engineering Student Center at the University of Minho, composed of volunteer students whose main goal is to represent and promote the course. It is a united and dynamic group capable of providing unique and enriching experiences for your future professional life.

projects.title: Projects | CeSIUM
projects.description: These are the pojects developed by CeSIUM.

about.description: Get to know more about us.

become_a_member.title: Become a Member | CeSIUM
become_a_member.description: Get to know the perks of being a CeSIUM member.

hero.description: Software Engineering Student Center at University of Minho

events.title: Events
events.description: At CeSIUM, we organize a variety of activities - pedagogical, recreational, and more. Got your attention? We have a page with all the dates.

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: One of the advantages of being a member of CeSIUM is our incredible partnerships. Discover all the opportunities our partners have for you.

shortcut_panes.title: Team
shortcut_panes.description: Meet the dedicated team that makes CeSIUM move, every day.

shortcut_panes.title: Departments
shortcut_panes.description: CeSIUM operates in various areas. Get to know our departments.

shortcut_panes.title: Events

cesium: CeSIUM - Software Engineering Student Center at UMinho

caos.name: Center for **Open Source Support**
caos.description: CAOS is responsible for all software development associated with CeSIUM, from platforms that directly serve the organization and its events to useful platforms for Software Engineering students.
caos.short_description: Handles all software development for CeSIUM, from event platforms to tools useful for students.

dmc.name: Department of **Marketing and Content**
dmc.description: DMC is responsible for promoting activities and managing CeSIUM's social media, meaning all of CeSIUM's marketing. Its work focuses mainly on CeSIUM's design and image, as well as communication and photographic documentation of activities.
dmc.short_description: Manages CeSIUM's marketing, social media, and creative communications.

drem.name: Department of **External Relations and Merchandising**
drem.description: DREM is the department that ensures the establishment and maintenance of partnerships that CeSIUM members can benefit from, as well as handling contact with all external entities. It is also responsible for creating the organization's merchandise, designed for all our students.
drem.short_description: Builds partnerships, manages external communications, and designs merchandise.

ped.name: **Pedagogical** Department
ped.description: The Pedagogical Department is responsible for organizing educational activities such as study sessions, lectures, workshops, and more, helping students with their studies and fostering interest in various areas of Computer Science.
ped.short_description: Organizes lectures, workshops, and study sessions to support the students' learning.

rec.name: **Recreational** Department
rec.description: The Recreational Department organizes social and leisure activities to bring students together and enhance their academic experience. The activities range from gala dinners, karaoke nights, and game nights to sports tournaments, academic parties, snack gatherings, and much more.
rec.short_description: Plans social and recreational events to enrich the students' experience.

collaborate_card.title: Become a collaborator
collaborate_card.text: You can join these departments and contribute to making your organization work.

member_card.title: Become a member
member_card.text: Participate in all our events for free and enjoy tons of other benefits.

store_card.title: Store
store_card.text: At the CeSIUM Store, we have hoodies, jackets, t-shirts, socks, mugs, stickers, and much more. If you're a member, you'll also have discounts on all products!

cesium.title: What is **CeSIUM?**
cesium.subtitle: CeSIUM is a Student Center for Software Engineering at the University of Minho, composed of volunteer students whose main goal is to represent and promote the course. It is a united and dynamic group capable of providing unique and enriching experiences for your future professional life.

slide1.title: What is **CeSIUM?**
slide1.subtitle: CeSIUM is a Student Center for Software Engineering at the University of Minho, composed of volunteer students whose main goal is to represent and promote the course. It is a united and dynamic group capable of providing unique and enriching experiences for your future professional life.

slide2.title: Our **mission**
slide2.subtitle: At CeSIUM, we strive to create a collaborative and relaxed environment for all Software Engineering students. Through events, workshops, and networking opportunities, we help develop technical skills, foster teamwork, and prepare you for the real world.

slide3.title: What we **offer?**
slide3.subtitle: Join us to gain access to hackathons, talks, connections to the business world, programming sessions, and more. Whether you're looking to invest in your knowledge and skills or find your next unforgettable opportunity.

slide4.title: Get **involved**
slide4.subtitle: Want to be part of a passionate and driven community? CeSIUM welcomes all Software Engineering students eager to learn, grow, and contribute.

hero.title: **Software Engineering** Student Center at University of Minho
hero.description: The year was 1995, and the Bachelor's Degree in Systems and Informatics Engineering (LESI) at UM was ongoing. (...) It was in this context that a group of 3rd-year students asked the Course Directorate (DC), which I was leading at the time, for support to officially create a Student Center. (...) From that moment on, the journey of this student group began, which, 20 years later, still carries the same name and acronym, staying true to its purpose of promoting the course's image and defending the interests of its members.
hero.subtitle: Director of the Informatics Department - 2017

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: CeSIUM wouldn't exist without our incredible team, which works every day to keep the group running and make students' years in the course unique. Meet them here.

cesium.title: What is CeSIUM?
cesium.subtitle: CeSIUM is the Student Center for Software Engineering at the University of Minho, made up of a team of volunteer students, with the primary goal of representing and promoting the Software Engineering course. It is a united and dynamic group, capable of providing enriching and unique experiences, thus complementing your academic life while never forgetting to prepare you for your future professional life.
cesium.description: We strive to organize activities with similar and complementary content to the course, as well as to promote and publicize leisure and socialization events among students and alumni. We also represent the collective interests of Software Engineering students before organizations or institutions to ensure their academic journey is more fulfilling.

images.alt: Class full of Software Engineering students during a workshop.
Group of CeSIUM students gathered on stage during Software Engineering Week, with the Void mascot.

team.title: Team
team.description: Here we introduce you to the members of our team, from the Presidency to the directors of the various Departments, as well as the General Assembly Board and the Fiscal Council.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: From SEI - the Software Engineering Week, an annual activity that connects students to innovations and companies - to CoderDojo - which brings programming to the younger generation - CeSIUM creates and participates in various projects. Discover them here.

card.mobile_description: Held annually at the Gualtar campus of the University of Minho, it combines technological innovations with industry experts for students.
card.desktop_description: The Software Engineering Week is held annually at the Gualtar campus of the University of Minho, aiming to combine the latest technological innovations with the best industry experts to offer a fantastic program to our students.

card.mobile_description: An annual programming competition where participants have 48 hours to develop a project.
card.desktop_description: The Bugsbyte Hackathon is an annual programming competition in which participants have 48 hours to work as a team and develop a technological project focused on an entrepreneurial and impactful solution.

card.mobile_description: A global, volunteer-driven, non-profit movement that aims to teach children and young people aged 7 to 17 how to program.
card.desktop_description: CoderDojo Braga is part of a global, volunteer-driven, non-profit movement that aims to teach children and young people aged 7 to 17 how to program. This project seeks to demonstrate how programming can be a force for positive change in the world.

departments.title: Departments
departments.subtitle: We operate with 5 departments that focus on the different areas of our activities as a core. Get to know them here.
departments.description: The departments at CeSIUM handle various aspects of the organization, from event planning and partnership management to communication and software development.

hero.title: Become a collaborator of
hero.description: You can be part of one or more departments, contributing to improving the operation of your student group.

join_team.title: Join the team
join_team.description: Do you want to meet new people within the course and engage in a dynamic and innovative environment while learning new and interesting concepts relevant to your professional future? What are you waiting for to join us? Get to know the team that will welcome you with open arms as a collaborator! We can't wait to have you on board!

choose_department.title: Choose your department
choose_department.description: If you love programming, CAOS is the place for you. More into design? Join DMC. You can collaborate with the department that suits you best, or if you can't choose just one, you can take part in multiple. If you don't know our departments yet, click the button below to learn more. Otherwise, we're waiting for you! Sign up now!

hero.title: Become a member of
hero.description: With a membership card, you can unlock various benefits, partnerships, and discounts.

exclusive_partnerships.title: Exclusive Partnerships
exclusive_partnerships.description: Have lunch at Sabor da Fruta and get a free coffee. Or at Café do Luís, with a drink included. Get free badges at Os Farias. Enjoy discounts on music and driving lessons. These are just some of the partnerships we have for you.

participate.title: Participate
participate.description: Participate in all our events for free and enjoy tons of other benefits.

member_kit.title: Member Kit
member_kit.description: Receive a starter pack of goodies, which may include a unique t-shirt, notebooks, stickers, pens, and much more. Additionally, we offer you a tote bag to carry everything with you.

room_acess.title: Room Access
room_acess.description: You can access our room and use our resources.

represent.title: Represent
represent.description: You can represent CeSIUM in events and competitions.

discounts.title: Discounts
discounts.description: You can get discounts on our store and with our partners.

advantages.title: Lifetime benefits
advantages.description: The benefits of having a membership card never expire, as the registration fee is lifelong - you pay once, and you're a member forever. These are the benefits that membership has to offer:

items.title: Events
items.description: Curious about the dates of our events? We have a page for that. For more course dates, we have the Calendarium.

items.title: Shop
items.description: T-shirts, accessories and materials from CeSIUM and our projects - everything is available in our online store.

items.title: Become a member
items.description: CeSIUM members are entitled to a number of benefits. Discover them now and the partnerships they entitle you to.

items.title: Become a collaborator
items.description: If you'd like to be part of the team, we'd love to welcome you. Find out more about how you can become a collaborator.

team.title: Join the team
team.subtitle: Do you want to meet new people within the course and immerse yourself in a dynamic and innovative environment while learning new and interesting concepts relevant to your professional future? What are you waiting for to join us? Get to know the team that will welcome you with open arms as a collaborator! We can't wait to have you on board!

choose_department.title: Choose your department
choose_department.subtitle: If you enjoy programming, CAOS will be your thing. Interested in design? Join DMC. You can join the department you identify with the most, and if you can't decide, you can even join several. If you don't know our departments yet, click the button below to learn more. Otherwise, we're waiting for you!

join.title: We are waiting for you
join.subtitle: Being a collaborator at CeSIUM is more than just working - it's about learning new things, meeting amazing people, and being part of experiences. If it sounds good to you, apply now.

events.title: Events
events.warning: Check other months to see more events. This page only includes CeSIUM events. For more events, such as tests or deadlines, visit the [Calendarium](https://calendario.cesium.pt). To stay updated, follow our [Instagram](https://instagram.com/cesiuminho).
events.weekDays: Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat
events.noEvents: There are no events to display.

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: One of the advantages of being a member of CeSIUM is our incredible partnerships. Discover all the oportunities our partners have for you.

perks.description: **10% discount** on purchases over 7€, except on Wednesdays and Sundays.

**Free drink** with Special Hamburger, American Toast, Salmon Toast, and Special Hot Dog menus.

**Fanta, Nestea, Water, Sprite, Ginger ale**
**10% discount** on board games and no minimum consumption.
**40€ discount** on Category B driving license.
When purchasing 8 pins, the **pin with the lowest value** is free.
**5€ discount** on all activities (music, dance, martial arts, theater, etc).
When purchasing the academic attire, **get 3 additional badges** (in addition to the usual 4).
**0.40€ discount** on the student menu and pizzas.
**Free coffee** with the purchase of a menu.

members.title: Sounds good?
members.desc: You can sign up as a CeSIUM member online in a minute. Click the button below to get started or talk to us if you have any questions.

collaborators.title: We're waiting for you
collaborators.desc: Being a CeSIUM collaborator is more than just working – it's about learning new things, meeting incredible people, and being part of unique experiences. If that sounds good to you, apply now.

not_found.title: Oops...
not_found.description: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It may have been deleted or moved elsewhere. We invite you to visit the homepage to explore the many pages we have that don’t return a 404 error.
